alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; Eastern San Miguel County; Far Northeast Highlands; Northeast Highlands; Quay County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued October 22 at 2:05PM MDT until October 23 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 7 PM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. For the Wind Advisory, west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Central Highlands, Quay County, Eastern San Miguel County, Far Northeast Highlands and Northeast Highlands. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 6 AM to 7 PM MDT Sunday. For the Wind Advisory, until 5 PM MDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; Eastern San Miguel County; Far Northeast Highlands; Northeast Highlands; Quay County
